QuestData.Title: Elemental Ore
QuestData.Description: You're going to have to deal with the leader of Therazane's forces here. However, to get you to him quickly and safely, I'm going to need to perform a ritual.$B$BGo out into the field and collect elemental ore from the ragers. With enough of it, I should be able to make you one with the ground to get you where you need to go.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you all that is required?
QuestData.RewardText: These should do. I'll just need a moment to prepare the ritual.
